Home.description-services: We deliver expert legal solutions with a commitment to protecting your rights and achieving the best outcomes.

card1.title: Corporate Law
card1.description: Tatoyan and Partners Law Firm provides comprehensive legal services to legal entities, ensuring legal support both in day-to-day operations and strategic planning. Our services include:
subItems: Legal advice on corporate governance, organization, and operational activities
Ongoing legal support by acting as a company’s legal advisor in resolving various legal matters
Assistance with labor law issues, including employer-employee relations
Registration of businesses, trademarks, and trade names
Corporate restructuring, mergers, demergers, and liquidation
Full contractual legal support, including drafting, analysis, and legal validation of contracts
Legal consulting in tax matters and tax-related disputes
Legal compliance monitoring, including updates on legislative changes and provision of tailored solutions
bottomDescription: Our professionals place a high priority on each client’s legal security and compliance with applicable laws and regulations. All data and documents received during cooperation are strictly treated with confidentiality.
We highly value the trust of our clients and strive to build long-term, stable partnerships.

card2.title: Administrative Law
card2.description: Our attorneys also handle cases in the field of administrative law, representing clients before state and local self-government bodies, as well as in administrative courts. We offer the following services in this area:

item1.title: Legal representation in administrative cases, including:
subiItems: Representation before administrative authorities during pre-litigation proceedings
Appeals against acts, actions, or inaction of administrative bodies through hierarchical (supervisory) procedures
Challenging acts, actions, or inaction of administrative bodies before administrative courts within the scope of claims for annulment, enforcement, obligation, or recognition
Representation in special proceedings, including cases concerning the legality of normative legal acts

card3.title: Civil Law
card3.description: Our firm’s lawyers have extensive experience in civil law and civil litigation. Their caseload covers, but is not limited to, the following areas:

item1.title: Property Disputes
subiItems: Recognition of ownership rights, including through acquisitive prescription; disputes regarding expropriation for public interest; division of jointly owned property, including community property between spouses.

item2.title: Procurement-related Disputes
subiItems: Challenging the actions (or inaction) and decisions of contracting authorities or evaluation committees; legal representation in court; disputes regarding the unilateral termination of procurement contracts; challenging technical specifications or the requirements of prequalification announcements or invitations.

item3.title: Lease and Contractual Obligations
subiItems: Disputes concerning violations of lease agreements, unpaid rent; breaches of contracts including debt, loan, gift, and compensation agreements; disputes concerning the performance or termination of legal obligations.

item4.title: Inheritance Law Disputes
subiItems: Legal support for inheritance opening, recognition of inheritance rights, division of inherited property; disputes related to the validity or invalidity of wills.

ite5.title: Non-Pecuniary Damages and Protection of Personal Rights
subiItems: Protection of honor, dignity, and business reputation; claims for compensation of non-material damages caused to the injured party; Claims arising from the violation of fundamental rights guaranteed by the European Convention on Human Rights, including the right to life, protection from torture or inhuman or degrading treatment or punishment, liberty and security, fair trial, effective remedy, and property rights.

card3.bottomDescription: Our lawyers approach each case individually, combining a legal assessment with the client’s practical interests. We are committed to delivering effective, prompt, and lawful solutions with a high standard of legal responsibility.

card4.title: Criminal Law
card4.description: Tatoyan and Partners Law Firm provides legal services in criminal matters, offering full legal representation at both the investigative and trial stages. Our lawyers are engaged in the proceedings from the moment an individual is summoned by law enforcement—whether as a witness, victim, suspect, or accused. We provide legal support throughout all stages of the criminal process, ensuring full protection of our clients’ rights and legitimate interests.

item1.title: Our services include:
subiItems: Legal advice and support during pre-trial investigation
Representation before the police, investigative authorities, and the prosecutor’s office
Participation in all investigative actions, including interrogations, confrontations, searches, etc.
Defense of accused and suspected individuals
Representation of victims and civil claimants
Legal representation in all court instances—from trial to appellate and cassation levels

card4.bottomDescription: Our attorneys possess in-depth knowledge and practical experience in criminal procedure, including complex and high-profile cases. We operate on the principle of the supremacy of the client's rights, acting independently, responsibly, and with high professional integrity.

card5.title: Banking and Finance
card5.description: Tatoyan and Partners Law Firm offers comprehensive legal services in the banking and financial sectors, providing high-level advisory and representation both locally and internationally.

item1.title: We offer:
subiItems: Legal advice on banking and financial transactions
Legal support in credit, insurance, and guarantee-related matters
Representation in banking disputes before courts and other competent bodies
Legal assistance in corporate finance, investment projects, and financial transactions
Consulting on anti-money laundering (AML) and financial crime compliance
Legal services related to leasing, factoring, and other alternative financial instruments
Drafting, legal review, and validation of financial contracts
Ensuring compliance with local and international financial regulations and standards

card5.bottomDescription: Our team includes seasoned legal professionals specializing in banking and financial law who offer practical, efficient, and targeted solutions tailored to each client’s specific needs and business environment.

card6.title: International Legal Representation
card6.description: Tatoyan and Partners Law Firm offers services in international legal protection, utilizing treaty-based and precedent-based mechanisms of international law, as well as procedural tools tailored to the nature of the case, the competent jurisdiction, and the relevant field of law.

item1.title: Key areas of representation include:
subiItems: Formulation of legal arguments - Based on international treaties, case law, and relevant domestic legal provisions

Initiating interim measures - Proposals for urgent measures in international courts (e.g., injunctions), including before the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR), UN International Court of Justice (ICJ), and other bodies
Evidence presentation and expert support - Substantiated presentation of legal facts, submission of supporting documentation, and coordination of expert assessments
Alternative dispute resolution - Engagement in international mediation and arbitration processes

Petitions to international courts - Drafting and submission of applications to international human rights bodies such as the European Court of Human Rights, the UN Human Rights Committee, and other commissions

card7.title: Legal Consulting and Expertise
card7.description: Tatoyan and Partners Law Firm provides professional legal consulting and expertise across various fields of law.

item1.title: We offer ad hoc consultations tailored to each specific case, based on the substance of the issue, applicable legal acts, and factual circumstances.
subiItems: Our expert opinions are prepared following detailed legal research by experienced professionals, resulting in comprehensive, specialized, and multifaceted conclusions. We emphasize in-depth analysis, systematic application of the law, and the examination of all possible legal angles relevant to the client’s issue, ensuring truly valuable and reliable legal support.
We also have sector-specific expertise in legal examination, including:

item2.title: Human Rights and Public Law
subiItems: Opinions on human rights violations prepared within the framework of applications to the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR) and Armenian legislation
Legal opinions on the lawfulness of public authorities’ actions

item3.title: Energy and Infrastructure
subiItems: Legal analysis related to renewable energy projects and international investment agreements
Legally drafted opinions concerning licensing processes for electricity production and distribution

item4.title: Telecommunications and IT
subiItems: Consulting on the application of international standards in data protection and electronic communications

Legal opinions on regulatory obligations of telecommunications operators Our experienced lawyers provide in-depth legal expertise and consulting tailored for technology companies, startups, and digital service providers.

card8.title: Alternative Dispute Resolution
card8.description: Tatoyan and Partners Law Firm is guided by the conviction that not all disputes must be resolved in court. Often, effective and modern solutions are found through alternative dispute resolution (ADR), including mediation, conciliation, negotiation, and comprehensive or extended analysis of the dispute’s subject matter.

item1.title: Our team offers high-quality legal support throughout the dispute resolution process, helping parties to:
subiItems: Avoid unnecessary litigation costs
Prevent lengthy court proceedings
Find flexible and mutually beneficial solutions

card8.bottomDescription: Through mediation and negotiations, we present several legal and practical options for resolving the issue, from which the client may choose the most suitable solution. By turning to our firm, you can be confident that your matters will receive professional, interest-protecting approaches without escalating the conflict.

Home.attorneys-description: Our skilled attorneys are dedicated to delivering exceptional legal services, utilizing the latest technology to offer efficient and costeffective solutions tailored to your unique needs.
Home.background-title: Trusted by Many, Proven by Results
Home.background-description: We understand that many people may be reluctant to contact a lawyer because they’re worried they won’t be able to afford the fees. They may be tempted to try to handle their legal matter themselves, but that’s often a recipe for a less-than-desirable outcome.
Home.clients-description: Our skilled attorneys are dedicated to delivering exceptional legal services, utilizing the latest technology to offer efficient and cost-effective solutions tailored to your unique needs.

client1.name: William Doyle
client1.thinks: Great experience. Very communicative, pleasant, and knowledgeable all the way from the legal secretary to the paralegal to the attorney. Everyone was on the same page at the same time, very refreshing. Everything was done online as I was in NY and my transactions were for the state of AZ. TYVM

About.titile-description: Volutpa sit'eu o porttito dolor volutpa neque faucib, apraese egesta quisqua ut consect vita neque vita' aliqua,mi et scelerisqu tempus a felis feugiat.
About.titile-description2: At Tatoyan , we provide expert legal services with a commitment to excellence. Our team of experienced attorneys works tirelessly to ensure that your legal needs are met with professionalism,integrity, and personal attention. With years of experience in various areas of law, we are dedicated to helping individuals and businesses navigate complex legal challenges.
About.mission-description: Our mission is to uphold justice, advocate for our clients, and provide ethical, results-driven legal representation. With dedication and expertise, we protect your rights and guide you through every legal challenge. We aim to deliver reliable, efficient, and compassionate legal solutions tailored to our clients' unique situations.

Partners.title: Our Trusted Partners
Partners.title-description: At Tatoyan, we collaborate with a network of highly respected partners across various industries. Our strong partnerships enhance the quality of services we provide, ensuring that our clients receive the best possible legal support.

partner1.name: Union of Banks of Armenia (UBA)
partner1.description: The Union of Banks of Armenia (UBA) serves as a platform for presenting the activities, initiatives, training programs, and major events of all banks operating in Armenia to the public. Based on Article 9.4.17 of the UBA Charter, and in accordance with the Civil Code of the Republic of Armenia and the Law on Commercial Arbitration, the UBA Board has decided to establish the “Financial Arbitration” institution. For this purpose, the institution’s charter and regulations have been approved. In cooperation with the UBA, Tatoyan and Partners Law Firm has provided legal expert opinion within the scope of legislative analysis.

partner2.name: DSA Advisory Group CJSC
partner2.description: Within the framework of a memorandum of cooperation with Tatoyan and Partners, DSA Advisory Group offers the following services: a. Business Consulting Services – consulting on management of client businesses, feasibility and planning of new projects. b. Legal Advisory Services – consulting related to incorporation and legal matters of the client in Armenia and abroad. c. Tax Advisory Services – consulting related to national and international tax systems, regulations, and administration. d. Accounting and Financial Advisory Services – consulting on accounting management and preparation of financial reports, including practical application of both international and national standards.

partner3.name: Villamontan LLC
partner3.description: Villamontan LLC promotes the development of tourism and pottery in Armenia and its regions by showcasing the country’s culture and landmarks to both local and foreign visitors. The company also operates hotels in Yerevan, Gyumri, and Syunik province. Tatoyan and Partners Law Firm provides legal advisory services to the company and represents its interests in various legal matters.
